posts.title: Essential Killing
posts.excerpt: allmovie wrote:A pair of American security operatives (Zach Cohen and Iftach Ofir) are on patrol in Afghanistan when they stumble upon a Taliban fighter (Vincent Gallo), who kills them despite his terror and nervousness. While trying to escape, the Afghan is captured by American forces; he’s tortured during interrogation, but doesn’t tell the Americans anything, …

posts._title: Kamran Shirdel – Teheran, payetakht-e Iran ast AKA Tehran is the Capital of Iran (1966)
posts.title: Teheran, payetakht-e Iran ast
posts.excerpt: “Tehran is the Capital of Iran” (1966-79) documents life in a deprived district in the south of Tehran. The images of destitution in Tehran’s poor areas is accompanied by a variety of spoken accounts: the official viewpoint on the district’s living conditions, what the inhabitants have to say, and occasional extracts read out of school …
posts.titleEnglish: Tehran is the Capital of Iran

posts.title: Mamiroo
posts.excerpt: Ayaz, a lonely seventy-year-old man, detests his life. He’s constantly in search of ways of ending his life. Some years back, on the way back from a family wedding party, the minibus which he was driving, falls in the bottom of a valley and people on board -all his own family- are killed. Now, Ayaz …

posts.title: Cipka
posts.excerpt: A young girl spends the evening alone at home. She decides to have some sweet solo pleasure session, but not everything goes according to plan.

posts.title: Avrora
posts.excerpt: The Aurora (Авро́ра) is a Russian protected cruiser, currently preserved as a museum ship in St. Petersburg. She became a symbol of the Communist Revolution in Russia.During the First World War the ship operated in the Baltic Sea. At the end of 1916, the ship was moved to Saint Petersburg (then Petrograd) for a major …

posts.title: Saekjeuk shigong
posts.excerpt: Eun Sik is 28 years old and has recently started school at the university. He is a member of the Cha Ryu group and practices with them daily, through painful endurance training. posts._title: Stéphane Lafleur – En terrains connus AKA Familiar Ground (2011)
posts.title: En terrains connus
posts.excerpt: Benoit and Maryse: a brother and sister with seemingly normal lives. Everything is changed by a series of coincidences… and the arrival of a man claiming to come from the future.

posts._title: Anna Biller – Three Examples of Myself as Queen (1994)
posts.title: Three Examples of Myself as Queen
posts.excerpt: A hilarious romp that turns topsy-turvy the old Hollywood standards of female sexuality and pleasure, Three Examples of Myself… brings together three fantasies of how women would run things if they were on the throne of power. Remixing fluffy musical numbers with a definite feminist twist, director Biller creates a rebellious coquette for the 90’s–a …

posts.title: Bodysong
posts.excerpt: Quote:“Simultaneously developed by its writer-director Simon Pummell as a film, a website, and a gallery installation, Bodysong is not a work lacking in ambition.
